1.title: mRNA alters DNA
1.text: RNA alters a person's DNA when taking the COVID-19 vaccine.
1.alternate_text: RNA alters a person's DNA when taking the coronavirus vaccine.

2.title: Infertility
2.text: The COVID-19 vaccine causes infertility or miscarriages in women.
2.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine causes infertility or miscarriages in women.

3.title: Natural immunity
3.text: Natural COVID-19 immunity is better than immunity derived from a COVID-19 vaccine.
3.alternate_text: Natural immunity is better than immunity derived from a coronavirus vaccine.

4.title: Bell's palsy
4.text: The COVID-19 vaccine causes Bell's palsy.
4.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine causes Bell's palsy.

5.title: Antibody-dependent enhancement
5.text: The immune system overreacts to COVID-19 after taking the COVID-19 vaccine through antibody-dependent enhancement.
5.alternate_text: The immune system overreacts to coronavirus after taking the coronavirus vaccine through antibody-dependent enhancement.

7.title: Aborted fetus material
7.text: The COVID-19 vaccine contains tissue from aborted fetuses.
7.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine contains tissue from aborted fetuses.

8.title: Microchip tracking
8.text: The COVID-19 vaccine was developed to control the general population either through microchip tracking or nanotransducers in our brains.
8.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine was developed to control the general population either through microchip tracking or nanotransducers in our brains.

9.title: Deadlier than COVID-19
9.text: More people will die as a result of a negative side effect to the COVID-19 vaccine than would actually die from the coronavirus.
9.alternate_text: More people will die as a result of a negative side effect to the coronavirus vaccine than would actually die from the virus.

10.title: Side effects
10.text: There are severe side effects of the COVID-19 vaccines, worse than having the virus.
10.alternate_text: There are severe side effects of the coronavirus vaccines, worse than having the virus.

11.title: Rapid development
11.text: The COVID-19 vaccine is not safe because it was rapidly developed and tested.
11.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine is not safe because it was rapidly developed and tested.

12.title: Vaccine causes COVID-19
12.text: The COVID-19 vaccine can cause COVID-19 because it contains the live virus.
12.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine can cause COVID-19 because it contains the live virus.

13.title: Testing positive
13.text: The COVID-19 vaccine causes people to test positive for COVID-19.
13.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine causes people to test positive for COVID-19.

14.title: Risk for other illnesses
14.text: The COVID-19 vaccine can increase risk for other illnesses.
14.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine can increase risk for other illnesses.

15.title: Vaccine trial deaths
15.text: Many people already have died from the COVID-19 vaccine trials.
15.alternate_text: Many people already have died from the coronavirus vaccine trials.

16.title: Vaccine causes autism
16.text: The COVID-19 vaccine can cause autism.
16.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine can cause autism.

17.title: Egg allergy
17.text: The COVID-19 vaccine should not be taken by people who are allergic to eggs.
17.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine should not be taken by people who are allergic to eggs.

20.title: Vaccine toxins
20.text: Vaccines contain unsafe toxins such as formaldehyde, mercury or aluminum.
20.alternate_text: The coronavirus vaccine contains unsafe toxins such as formaldehyde, mercury or aluminum.
